channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Sharif University of Technology on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Gradual Domain Adaptation via Manifold-Constrained Distributionally Robust Optimization
item.description: This paper introduces DRODA, a novel method guaranteeing bounded error in gradual domain adaptation by leveraging manifold constraints and adaptive Wasserstein radii.

item.title: Scanning Trojaned Models Using Out-of-Distribution Samples
item.description: TRODO: a novel trojan detection method using out-of-distribution samples, effectively identifies trojaned classifiers even against adversarial attacks and with limited data.
